about_the_game:
In DARKWORLD, you’re a snailf et you live in a forge a bit odd…

Your work, as an assistant, is to clean the rare and mysterious weapons brought by some fierce adventurers.

Some come from far away, so, don’t make them wait too much! Use all your different tools (brushes, hammer, anti-rust), organize yourself freely and MAKE IT SHINE!!! Bit by bit, as they go by, you’ll be able to learn more about DARKWORLD’s curse and its legends…

WHY YOU'LL LOVE THIS GAME?

- Cosy atmosphere, without any enemy nor violence

- Large range of cleaning tools and different weapons

- Appealing characters & rich storylines, created by the famous comic book artist Valentin Seiche (The World, Samurai Gunn:Trigger Soul)

- Very satisfying feedbacks when cleaning each layer on weapons

- Lots of cuteness & humor and really lovely animations

- Some SURPRISES !

GAMEPLAY

Pick you hammer and crash some rocks to free weapons!

Before cleaning them… Why?

Because, it’s fun ! And if you're lucky, you'll find some gems among all the weeds ans scraps...

Clean your client’s weapon with your pencils or brushes!

Pick one of the pencils available and clean the dust on weapons :

Some brushes are heavier and slow but more powerful or/and with a better range,

Other ones are lighter so quicker to use but less efficient…

You also have to remove the rust with a large variety of tools...

LISTEN TO CLIENTS TO DISCOVER AMAZING STORIES!

The blacksmith will get a lots of clients’ visits : these badass characters will bring you a weapon related to amazing tales and legends!

Listen and discover more about the lore of Darkworld and unlock some of its secrets!

ADDITIONAL FEATURES

-Tiny house for your snailf to sleep in : decoration, skins for your snailf, bed...

-Minions unlock through secrets : they can help you to clean and do other stuff

-Day/Night cycle

-Mini-games and other suprises...

-Amazing music by Anton Corazza (TMNT: Shredder's Revenge, Demon Turf, Super Catboy...)

name: Darkworld
short_description: In Darkworld, you’re a snailf living your best life in the shop of a blacksmith. Listen to his clients to learn more about their stories, do your best to clean their weapons and improve your snailf’s business in this cosy video game when even hammers are cute!
